xml_gemini22gemini23: Convert from Gemini 2.2 to 2.3 on import
searchOver: Welcome to the Natural Resources Wales Discovery Metadata Catalogue, where you can search for information on {{records}} datasets that are held by Natural Resources Wales. Read more about metadata and how to use this site in the online documentation. For more information on how you can access our datasets please visit Accessing our Data.
searchOver-loggedIn:
Welcome to the Natural Resources Wales Discovery Metadata Catalogue, where you can search for information on {{records}} datasets that are held by Natural Resources Wales. Read more about metadata and how to use this site in the online documentation.

If you have created or acquired a dataset that requires metadata or would like to add information to our current metadata then please contact opendata@cyfoethnaturiolcymru.gov.uk
gmd:DQ_DomainConsistency: Data Quality Reports (Domain Consistency and INSPIRE)
zarooResult: No results found. If you are searching by the metadata URI please include the wildcard * in your search e.g. *98736. If you need assistance in finding metadata records, please contact opendata@cyfoethnaturiolcymru.gov.uk
anyFieldTitle: For precise search results please use “ “ for exact matches. e.g. “Areas of Outstanding Natural Beauty”. To search using the metadata URI, please include the wildcard * in your search e.g. *98736
recordNotFound: The metadata entry you are looking for is no longer available. If you need assistance in finding metadata records, please contact opendata@cyfoethnaturiolcymru.gov.uk or for NRW staff please ensure you are signed in.
limitationsPublicAccess: Limitations on Public Access and Use
ui-showMosaic: Show planned outage message on Home page
plannedOutage: Please be aware that Data Discovery will be unavailable from 28/03/2024 (15:00) to 28/03/2024 (16:00). Apologies for any inconvenience, if you have any queries, please contact opendata@cyfoethnaturiolcymru.gov.uk
createMetadataError-duplicateUUID: There is already an existing record with this resource identifier. Get the next available identifier here
nextAvailableIdentifierGuidance: Copy the identifier above into the correct identifier template below.
